climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: BASIC INFORMATION - Package contains 2 panels. Silver grommets on each panel
DESIGN and TEXTURE - This diamond pattern blackout curtain features a smooth and elegant fabric with a silky touch and a beautiful drape that bring charm and modernity to your home
FUNCTION CURTAINS - These thermal insulated curtains block out sunlight, balance temperature by insulating against heat and reduce outside noise
CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Hand wash, wash below 86°F, gentle cycle. This pair of blackout drapes is ideal for bedroom, living room, baby, kids’ nursery, kitchen, gaming rooms, school playroom
The DECONOVO DIFFERENCE - At Deconovo, we champion meeting customer expectations. Our customer service is only one e-mail away to help you choose the size and solve ALL your after sales issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Show stopper Beaut
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful curtains well made and elegant, they block the light i have large windows and sometimes the sun light coming in can be a little bothersome and these curtains are great for blocking the sunlight and so far the cold, I live in NY and the temperature has been around forty degrees but i will update this review once it gets colder. Overall im happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly happy with these...
reviews.reviewText: Using these in a bathroom and they're perfect... nice and thick and the gold looks very tasteful and high-end... using in a $2.5M home too... nobody would ever guess they were this inexpensive. Oh... one suggestion - I would have made these with gold grommets and this was a concern of mine but they're barely noticeable... still, I notice, but 95% of people won't notice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So much better than the pictures suggest. The gold printing on the fabric is iridescent and adds dimension, and the deep blue fabric is soft and silky to the touch. They look and feel much more expensive than they are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Tried other curtains of similar price and the fabric was stiff and looked cheap. This one drapes and hangs beautifully. The design is nice. It’s printed on. Not stitched. But it looks good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, block light, but not blackout
reviews.reviewText: The curtains are pretty. They do not have wrinkles. They block a good amount of light, but I would label them as room darkening instead of blackout. Pinpoints of light can be seen through the fabric.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great and works well!
reviews.reviewText: These curtains look great! I got the white ones and it doesn’t block as much light as my previous all black blackout curtains, but it does a good job (and looks way cuter). The attached photo was taken around 12pm in a south facing window.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and actually blocks out light
reviews.reviewText: Super smooth and soft, it actually blocks out the light while adding some thermal protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite brand of curtains
reviews.reviewText: I’ve purchased several sets of curtains from this company and absolutely love them. In a direct sunlight window they eliminate about 99% of the light coming through. The designs always look great and the quality of the fabric and construction is premium.
Curtains are good quality, not sheer, keep out sunlight, nice design. No complaints and would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 19, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Badly sewn. Longer on one side than the other. This is my 2nd pair as the first pair were too short. Paid £15 to return and ordered new ones! These ones are wonky and cant contact seller as it just directs you to amazon customer service which isnt working. Not good at all would not reccomend for the price.

So these curtains are very pretty and so soft. My issue is my heater is under the window so I had to tuck my curtain in, now it’s thermal and warm. I’m very happy with them. My window faces the alley and it has significantly reduced sound as well. They were very wrinkly when I got them, but I’m sure an iron would get that out, I just moved and do not have one. Overall they’re a beautiful design and do what they say!

reviews.reviewTitle: Impressive blackout effect for the price
reviews.reviewText: Look beautiful and almost entirely blackout for my East facing bedroom window on a high floor apartment. It gets *a lot* of sun in the mornings and these curtains have made a huge difference

These curtains are beautiful! As much as I would love to give it them 5/5 there are a couple things that turned me off about this purchase. I purchased two packages Prime and JUST received them but as I was about to do my review I just noticed they went on sale today for $5 off! Also the design is so pretty but when I received them I noticed that the foil design comes off easily which is probably why it's recommended to wash them by hand (which is something I find VERY inconvenient) so for those reasons that is my rating.
